name: The Snow Bucketeer
description:
Play as an intrepid hero who must survive the snowstorm whilst fighting off evil monsters that come out at night. Snow falls on your boat that you must sweep up for points, but be sure not to get pelted in the head as it falls! Survive as long as you can to earn a high score.

You can customize your hero with 9,600 different combinations to truly make your character unique to you!
